title: Strumming Patterns
summary: Lock in steady down-up motion with common 4/4 grooves.
keyPoints: Use relaxed down-up motion from the wrist
Start with all downstrokes, then add upstrokes
Mute lightly with the fretting hand for texture
Keep the pick gliding across strings
commonMistakes: Stopping the hand on missed strums
Losing the count when adding upstrokes
Digging the pick too deep into strings
practiceDrill: Add upstrokes on the “ands” while counting
Add light muted strums on beats 2 and 4
Repeat with a second chord change
